title: Data Viz Dashboard
description: A web-based dashboard using D3.js and React to visualize real-time sales data with interactive charts and graphs.

title: E-commerce REST API
description: A robust RESTful API built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for a modern e-commerce platform.

title: Mobile Chat App
description: A cross-platform chat application developed with React Native and Firebase for real-time messaging.

title: Markdown Blog Platform
description: A responsive blog platform built with Next.js and styled with Tailwind CSS, using Markdown for posts.

title: AI Image Generator
description: A web app using Python and Flask that connects to the DALL-E API to generate images from text prompts.

title: Task Management Tool
description: A Kanban-style task manager with drag-and-drop functionality, built with Vue.js and a lightweight backend.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: A clean weather app that fetches data from a third-party API to display current and future forecasts.

title: URL Shortener Service
description: A backend service in Go that creates shortened URLs from long URLs, using Redis for storage.

title: iOS Recipe Finder
description: An iOS application built with SwiftUI that helps users find recipes by ingredients using the MealDB API.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Visualizer
description: A developer tool to visualize complex CI/CD pipelines, built with Svelte and leveraging Docker for execution.

title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A Kotlin Multiplatform mobile app for tracking expenses and income across both Android and iOS.

title: Real-time Stock Ticker
description: A web application using WebSockets and FastAPI to display real-time stock price updates.

title: 2D Platformer Game
description: A simple 2D platformer game with pixel art and physics, developed using the Godot game engine.

title: Regex Testing Tool
description: A web-based utility for testing regular expressions in real-time, built for performance with WebAssembly.

title: Code Snippet Manager
description: A desktop application using Electron and the Monaco Editor (from VS Code) for managing code snippets.
